item.title: This Post will be Abandoned Soon
item.description: Trying out a ggplot graph. ChickWeight %>% as.data.frame(.) %>% ggplot() + geom_line(aes(Time, weight, color = Chick)) + theme_minimal() + ylim(0,200) To create a new post in blogdown, use this code: # new_post("Title of post", ext = ".Rmd", tags = c("Tag1", "Tag2"), author = "Your Name)
